name: KameSame Dark Material
description: KameSame Dark Material design inspired by the WaniKani style of the same name by Luke-Filewalker.
additional_info:
Uses the same basic colour scheme as the WaniKani Dark Material userstyle by Luke-Filewalker: https://userstyles.org/styles/136560/wanikani-dark-material

Disclaimer: I'm not experienced in programming, so the CSS might be bad form, you can tell me. I wanted KameSame to look how WaniKani looks for me, so I did what I could.

Colour choices credited to Luke-Filewalker.
